title: Looking for someone to climb with
body:
hey all, looking for someone to duo with I'm Silver 1 atm but was gold 1 (plat promos) last season, just struggling to climb atm without a partner

add me 
IGN: vShockz

replies.body: (Might be harder with someone else) make sure they are your lvl and not higher so they dont carry you :S
Oi don't be a jerk mate

> [{quoted}](name=Ricochet Thunder,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=x5z44tAJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T07:16:50.927+0000)
>
> Oi don't be a jerk mate

Who is being a jerk xD
Hey I'm gold 5 finding it a bit hard to climb also.. I didn't play much ranked last season (like 10-20 games) and was only low silver, but I'm confident I can get to plat. Leme know ^^ IGN: 69er
